name: Transformations
description: Like many techniques born from the visual language of magic lanterns, the dissolve effect was incorporated into filmmaking and is still used today.

start.title: Powers of Ten
start.brief_description: The Eamses film shows a linear view of our universe â€“ first from the human scale to the sea of galaxies, then directly down to the nucleus of a carbon atom. With images, narration and a distance register, it gives a clue to the relative size of things.

end.title: Black or White (1991)
end.brief_description: Michael Jackson’s “Black or White” music video premiered on MTV, BET, VH1, and Fox, achieving their highest Nielsen ratings ever at the time, on November 14, 1991. The video was directed by John Landis, who previously directed “Thriller”.

constellations_other.name: Transformations
constellations_other.description: Like many techniques born from the visual language of magic lanterns, the dissolve effect was incorporated into filmmaking and is still used today.

links.description: Computer technology gave the dissolve technique new life and allowed for more elaborate uses. Directed by John Landis, “Black or White” has a sequence where people of different races, nationalities and genders morph into one another.

start.title: Black or White (1991)
start.brief_description: Michael Jackson’s “Black or White” music video premiered on MTV, BET, VH1, and Fox, achieving their highest Nielsen ratings ever at the time, on November 14, 1991. The video was directed by John Landis, who previously directed “Thriller”.

end.title: FaceApp (2017)
end.brief_description: FaceApp is a mobile application for iOS and Android developed by Russian company Wireless Lab. The app generates highly realistic transformations of faces in photographs by using neural networks based on artificial intelligence.

constellations_other.name: Transformations
constellations_other.description: Like many techniques born from the visual language of magic lanterns, the dissolve effect was incorporated into filmmaking and is still used today.

links.description: The kind of digital trickery in “Black or White” is now easily accessible and on our phones. FaceApp is a mobile app that uses artificial intelligence to generate highly realistic transformations of faces in photographs.

start.title: Day/Night Dissolve Set, Loch Eck, Scotland, Circa 1903

end.title: The Wolf Man
end.brief_description: Ancient curses, fortune tellers and one of the most iconic movie monsters ever feature in Universal Pictures’ The Wolfman. After Larry Talbot (Lon Chaney Jr) returns home for his brother’s funeral, he’s bitten by a werewolf and transforms into a creature of the night.

constellations_other.name: Transformations
constellations_other.description: Like many techniques born from the visual language of magic lanterns, the dissolve effect was incorporated into filmmaking and is still used today.

links.description: Dissolving magic lantern slides showed the gradual transition from one projected image to another like landscapes dissolving from day to night. The Wolf Man used dissolves to depict Lon Chaney Jr’s character Larry Talbot transformation from man into beast.

start.title: The Wolf Man
start.brief_description: Ancient curses, fortune tellers and one of the most iconic movie monsters ever feature in Universal Pictures’ The Wolfman. After Larry Talbot (Lon Chaney Jr) returns home for his brother’s funeral, he’s bitten by a werewolf and transforms into a creature of the night.

end.title: Powers of Ten
end.brief_description: The Eamses film shows a linear view of our universe â€“ first from the human scale to the sea of galaxies, then directly down to the nucleus of a carbon atom. With images, narration and a distance register, it gives a clue to the relative size of things.

constellations_other.name: Transformations
constellations_other.description: Like many techniques born from the visual language of magic lanterns, the dissolve effect was incorporated into filmmaking and is still used today.

links.description: Using dissolves on a grander scale to The Wolf Man, husband and wife team Charles and Ray Eames short documentary Powers of Ten used them to depict the relative scale of the universe to the power of ten.

start.title: Powers of Ten

end.title: The Simpsons
end.brief_description: Set in Springfield, the average American town, the show focuses on the antics and everyday adventures of the Simpson family; Homer, Marge, Bart, Lisa and Maggie, as well as a virtual cast of thousands. Since the beginning, the series has been a pop culture icon, attracting hundreds of celebrities to guest star. The show has also made name for itself in its fearless satirical take on politics, media and American life in general.

constellations_other.name: Cartoon classics and criticism
constellations_other.description: A whole cavalcade of cartoons have successfully made the leap into arcades and onto consoles, but the relationship between cinema and videogames is far more likely to fizzle out.

constellations_other.name: Oh, no! Beta!
constellations_other.description: The Sony Betacam BVP-3P was a broadcast-quality camera that used Sony's Beta system, most commonly found in consumer cameras. During the Format Wars in the 1970s and 80s, Beta lost to the cheaper and more accessible Video Home System (VHS).

constellations_other.name: Transformations
constellations_other.description: Like many techniques born from the visual language of magic lanterns, the dissolve effect was incorporated into filmmaking and is still used today.

constellations_other.name: Nadia Tass
constellations_other.description: Comedic and cult classics take centre stage in Nadia Tass' career.

links.description: In the 2004 episode, “The Ziff Who Came to Dinner”, the opening couch gag zoomes out from the couch into the galaxy only to end back in the couch, referencing Powers of Ten.

links.description: “Black or White” singer, Michael Jackson, underwent an animation transformation to appear in an iconic episode of The Simpsons, “Stark Raving Dad”, where he lends his voice to a patient in a mental health facility, as well lending his voice to the famous song “Lisa It’s Your Birthday”.
